name: Hello
description:
Hello is a creative digital agency. We create intelligent, living systems for people to experience. We believe in building systems that are useful, usable, and desirable. We are passionate about the interactive medium and immerse ourselves in it each and every day. From brand identities to immersive online experiences to touch-screen kiosks, we are always looking to innovate. Good design is a given and often our multi-disciplinary approach leads us into uncharted territory.
Technology doesn’t scare us and in fact, we’ve become quite good friends. We are a different breed and work hard to perfect our craft.
